meanings.definition: Florigens: substances that induce or regulate flowering in plants.
meanings.sent1: The florigens in this fertilizer help the flowers bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study florigens to understand how plants know when to flower.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous garden gnome sprinkled extra florigens on the roses, causing them to bloom overnight!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like florigens to his heart, making it blossom with joy.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with the sweet scent of florigens, signaling the arrival of spring.
